question.q: What does the abbreviation 4G stand for?
Which of the following separates 4G from 3G?
3G can achieve data speeds of up to 1.2 Mbps. What are the data speeds possible with 4G?
By 2017, 3G will cover 85% of the world's population
4G LTE will cover 50% of the world's population by 2017
What is the real-world data speeds most users can expect from 4G?
Wi-fi is constricted to where 'hotspots' are located, and speeds can suffer with many users on a single connection point (like in restaurants or hotels).
4G is different than 3G because the high data transmission rate makes it faster to:

option.value: Download and upload videos and pictures

question.q: 3G and 4G enable broadband performance virtually anywhere. 4G connections can be even higher than cable or DSL.
Wi-Fi is an excellent way to connect in order to use GPS and turn-by-turn navigation.
